product_name: The North Face Eat My Dust Sport Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Eat My Dust Sport tank top enhances comfort as you push through your training routine thanks to its moisture-wicking performance fabric and expertly constructed high-impact bra. VaporWick(R) polyester fabric keeps up with hard-working pores, moving sweat from your skin to the fabric's outer face for quick evaporation. Mesh panels aligned in high-perspiration areas vent excess heat. Expertly constructed, high-impact internal bra features mesh racer-back straps, a brushed elastic band and two layers of fabric for modesty. 2 discreet pockets in the straps of the tank top store small items such as a house key or lip balm; moisture barrier in pocket protects contents. The North Face Eat My Dust Sport tank top features a reflective logo that helps increase your visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Eat My Dust Sport tank top enhances comfort as you push through your training routine thanks to its moisture-wicking performance fabric and expertly constructed high-impact bra.
